com.example.easyride.map

Class MarkerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.easyride.map.MarkerHandler

  • public class MarkerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles start and end locations and shows them as markers on the map.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T22
